projects.title: üç∏ Cocktail Search
projects.description: Search for Cocktails by name. Built with React, powered by TheCocktailDb.

projects.title: Leetdex
projects.description: Search for Pok√©mon information in the National Pok√©Dex via command line interface (like the 1337357 of H4X0R5). Built with Node, powered by the Pok√©Dex API.

projects.title: Lolibrary Search Filter API
projects.description: RESTful API serving filter data for Lolibrary's search API. Built with Node, Express, and Sequelize. Hosted on Heroku & powered by Heroku PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Lolibrary Filter Scraper
projects.description: Web scraper that captures filter data from Lolibrary.org public frontends and imports to database used by my implementaton of the Lolibrary Search Filter API. Built with Node and Puppeteer.

projects.title: Lolibrary Search Mobile App (DRAFT)
projects.description: Native mobile application that allows users to search Lolibrary.org's database of Lolita fashion items. Currently a work in progress. Built with React Native and Expo.

projects.title: TweeTeX Programming Language
projects.description: TeX-like syntactical sugar for the Twee3 programming language, made to author interactive hypertext literature. Built with Python as part of my undergraduate thesis in Computer Science and Writing at Marlboro College.
